title: COVID-19 tracker: Pfizer, Moderna vaccines sharply cut hospitalizations in older adults, CDC data show
author: Noah Higgins-Dunn; Fraiser Kansteiner; Eric Sagonowsky
description: New data from the CDC show that the COVID-19 vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna dramatically cut hospitalizations in older adults. | New data from the CDC show that the COVID-19 vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna dramatically cut hospitalizations in older adults. Europe is on track to reach herd immunity this summer, BioNTech's CEO said. Plus more.
